title: Champion Mastery
body:
Champion ~ MASTERY: I am a level 4 Zed,(Reaper) and i cannot use the Mastery Badge Emote and when i am in the loading screen, i can't see my banner. 
and on your website here (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) it says i have to be level 4 or higher and i am level 4! Plz help

replies.body:
>i cannot use the Mastery Badge Emote

I thought this was only at the end of the game. Not that I'd care, though.

>when i am in the loading screen, i can't see my banner.

That is probably a legitimate bug. Have you played at least more than three games and it still hasn't shown up?

Also,

>**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
